name: Calm and Focus: A Gentle Breathing Journey
description: Through simple, soothing techniques like Coherent Breathing and Humming Bee Breath, you'll gently balance your energy and quiet your mind.
introText: This gentle breathing routine is designed to bring calm and clarity to your day. Through simple, soothing techniques like Coherent Breathing and Humming Bee Breath, you'll gently balance your energy and quiet your mind. Conclude with a peaceful meditation, leaving you feeling centered, refreshed, and at ease.

lists.name: Alternate Nostril Breathing
lists.ratio: 4-4 ratio, brief pause when switching nostrils
